title: How many names does your cat have? - Quora

response.answer_text: MY cat’s full name is Bobby Bandero. When we adopted him my older sister (who he was intended for, whoops) named him Bobby, and my mum added Bandero as a reference to the voice actor of Puss in Boots, Antonio Banderas. Normally we only refer to him directly as Bobby, so that’s what he thinks his name is. The Bandero is basically a surname, just for introductions or papers. I also call him ‘kitten’, ‘kitty’ or ‘sweetie’ when I call him or are greeting him, but he probably doesn’t really care what I’m saying anymore than the fact that I am making positive noises. I also make kissie noises when calling him, so he might think that’s part of his name too. At least he recognises that when I call his proper first name he knows I’m addressing him and will react accordingly…if he feels like it.
Her name is Diamond. But at different times I have called her: Diva Sniffles Skittles Sweetness Princess Monster Belly Trickster Mini Panther To name a few!
